sentences.en: It is fair to assume that Dant è s was on board a smuggler.
sentences.cn: 读者可能已猜出来了,唐太斯是在一条走私船上.

sentences.en: Mr. Pan is said to a smuggler.
sentences.cn: 潘先生据说是个走私者.

sentences.en: Mr. Pan is said to be a smuggler.
That drug smuggler will live the rest of his life behind bars.
sentences.cn: 那个毒品走私犯将在牢狱之内了却残生.

sentences.en: The coastguard cutter cruise along the coast look for smuggler.
sentences.cn: 海岸警卫队缉私艇沿海巡逻搜寻走私犯.

sentences.en: The confiscation of the smuggled goods frustrated the smuggler greatly.
sentences.cn: 走私货物被没收,使这位走私犯非常沮丧.

sentences.en: The Customs officers caught the smuggler green - handed.
sentences.cn: 海关人员当场抓获了走私者.

sentences.en: The smuggler is in prison tonight, awaiting extradition to Britain.
sentences.cn: 这名走私犯今晚在监狱, 等待引渡到英国.

sentences.en: The smuggler is still at large.
sentences.cn: 那个走私贩仍逍遥法外.

sentences.en: The smuggler shrugged to the bugler hugging the bug in the tugboat.
sentences.cn: 走私者对在拖船中拥抱臭虫的号手耸耸肩.

sentences.en: The smuggler was finally obliged to inform against his boss.
sentences.cn: 那个走私犯最后不得不告发他的首领.

sentences.en: The villagers hid the smuggler away until the revenue men had gone.
sentences.cn: 村民们把走私者藏了起来,直到缉私人员离开.

sentences.en: We caught the smuggler on the spot.
sentences.cn: 我们当场抓到那个走私犯.

sentences.en: We confiscated all the drugs from this smuggler gang.
sentences.cn: 我们缴获了这伙私枭的全部毒品.

trans.tran_en: someone who takes something illegally from one country to another
